panels.content:
Flow Data by Science Discipline

This dashboard shows information related to science disciplines for top talkers using the NetSage Science Registry.
For the map, only flows with both ends tagged in the NetSage Science Registry have associated lines (others appear as a dot for the source or destination only). Different science disciplines use different colored lines, the arrows indicate the flow direction, and larger dots indicate larger flows.
The Sankey graph shows the top ten source organizations by volume for the selected discipline(s) and their associated top five destination organizations, with thicker lines for larger flow volumes.
For the summary table, if only one sampled flow was detected, the rate will be zero.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

panels.content:
Summary of All Disciplines

Only flows where source or destination has been tagged with a science discipline
from the Science Registry and were seen by the selected sensor(s) are counted.
If you have any questions, concerns, or other issues, feel free to contact us at netsage@iu.edu. Thanks! NSF GRANT 1540933 To Review the NetSage Data Policy click here
